recipe.title: Roasted Fingerlings with Preserved Lemon
ingredients: 3 tablespoons thinly sliced preserved lemon peel
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Toss potatoes, oil, and rosemary on a large rimmed baking sheet; season with salt and pepper. Roast, tossing halfway through, until soft and golden brown, 25–30 minutes. Toss warm potatoes with preserved lemon peel.
